title: Wout van Aert Calls Out Jasper Philipsen After Relegation in Bunch Sprint: ‘That’s a Bad Habit of His’
content:
Pedersen peeved at 'most aggressive' prize as green jersey battle gets messy: 'I would prefer to shower and get the bandage off.'

Read the full article at Wout van Aert Calls Out Jasper Philipsen After Relegation in Bunch Sprint: ‘That’s a Bad Habit of His’ on Velo.
author: ahood
